
TITLE Grilled Lemon Basil Tofu Burger

# Press [ 16 oz extra-firm tofu].
{[Marinade]
# In a small bowl combine:
[1/2 cup [finely chopped]  basil], [2 tbl Dijon mustard], [2 tbl honey], [2 tsp grated lemon rind], [1/4 cup  lemon juice], [1 tbl  olive oil], [1/2 tsp salt], [1/4 tsp pepper], and [3 cloves garlic[, minced]].
}

# Cut tofu crosswise into six slices and place on sheet pan. Brush with marinade; let stand one hour.

{[Sauce]
# In a small bowl combine: [1/3 cup [finely chopped] kalamata olives], [3 tbl sour cream], [3 tbl mayonnaise]. Stir well.
}

# Grill tofu; basting with reserved marinade.
